mEquipmentClass.description: The class of the equipment that spawned this attachment

mUseLocation.description: This value get replicated to clients so they can play effect

mAttachSocket.description: If this equipment should attach to a socket, this is the socket.

mArmAnimation.description: Arms animation this should play on the when the equipment is equipped (only used if mEquipmentSlot == ES_ARMS)

mBackAnimation.description: Arms animation this should play on the when the equipment is equipped (only used if mEquipmentSlot == ES_BACK)

mAttachedTo.description: The character this is attached to.

mEquipmentSlot.description: To what slot is this attachment attached
